website_summaries.verdict: This practical set has the essentials to get you started and keep your plants looking good. If your focus is soil care and bonsai trimming, this is a good pick.
pros: With 4 tools designed to prepare soil and 4 to fit your bonsai trimming needs, this set is ideal for beginners and enthusiasts
Includes a storage pouch and tweezers
cons: Complaints of bending and breaking of the tools have been noted

customer_reviews.title: Great size and weight
customer_reviews.text: These are MUCH larger than I thought (in a good way). I was worried that I would be getting some flimsy tools but these have a good weight to them and come in a nice carrying pouch. They were a gift for my boyfriends birthday, along with a bonsai tree starter kit. He opened these first and thought I had bought him nose hair trimmers. So, maybe this is a multi-use product!
customer_reviews.author: Ann M

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set, Rake was broken
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set, and I think it will work very well for my bonsai collection. The only sad thing was the rake was not attached to the handle, it appears it was never glued on like the other tools. I'll have to get some sort of glue or a nail to attach it to the post. Other than that, this should be a good set.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua F.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little kit! I had purchased two little Japanese maples recently from a Seattle area Bonsai nursery and had to separate them as they were growing right alongside each other with zero space. The included rake made separating the roots simple and easy with almost no loss to the delicate little seedlings. I cannot wait to use this on my future Bonsai endeavors!
customer_reviews.author: ELM

customer_reviews.title: Pruners are cheap
customer_reviews.text: I like the kit overall, but they threw in three pruners that have very stiff action, the blades do not slide smoothly to cut, and this can easily affect a person's ability to prune cleanly and I don't want to use them out of fear I'm going to cut a branch or leaf that I didn't mean to cut. If the pruners were smooth, I would easily give this five stars, but all the pruners are the same cheap quality, and that's half the kit :/
customer_reviews.author: Rita L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tool set for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great little tools. I bought these to maintain my first bonsai tree. I’m sure there are much better tools for a grower with more experience and more technical needs but these are great for starting out. I’ve used the clippers to trim up some branches and the hand tools to get the excess soil off of the roots when reporting. They seems like they are going to last a while. I’m happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery,  easy to use...
customer_reviews.text: Never had Bonsai tools before so I can not compare them with anything like it. These worked well as I re-potted my Bonsai. It really helped to clean the old soil and grit from the roots. It would have been helpful to have an instruction manual to tell me how best to use ALL of the tools. I clipped and trimmed the leaves and stems so hopefully my poor little Bonsai will survive.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie L.

customer_reviews.title: Great set! Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: As stated in the description, this is a high quality set. I'll admit that I was a bit surprised given what I paid for them. Wood is light but solid. The metal is thick and doesn't bend easily. The blades are sharp enough to cut foliage and small stems. I haven't tried them on any thicker branches, but assuming that's not what they're intended for. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Clayborne

customer_reviews.title: arrived with scratched tools
customer_reviews.text: Most of the tools in this set arrived badly scratched, especially the black coating of the mini rake and mini shovels . this was supposed to be a gift and it doesn't look good with these scratches.
customer_reviews.author: missus

customer_reviews.title: tools of the trade
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner gardener but these are perfect for my house plants.. They are easy to clean and are just perfect for maintaining the plants in their planters of all kinds and sizes. they come in a neat and cool pouch that is great for storage. I highly recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Mimie Wal

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of bonsai gardening. These are so worth it. I was nervous at first because the price but they have worked perfectly! The pouch they come in is also simple and very nice. From the rake to the shears they can all be used a ton! I have started to use them for all my flower potting as well and the shears are still sharp as ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little starter kit
customer_reviews.text: The overall value is great the tools and cutters arrive neatly tucked in its pleather pouch Of course we arent dealing with high end materials but for what one pays you cant beat the value. Soy sauce packet placed for size comparison
customer_reviews.author: Jpix

customer_reviews.title: these are a nice entry level set at a very attractive price - ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're into Bonsai, these are a nice entry level set at a very attractive price - I bought it as a gift and my friend was excited to receive it and says it works great !
customer_reviews.author: Defygravity

customer_reviews.title: As described.
customer_reviews.text: It works fine for bonsai's. Even use them for different plants of mine. The little snippers are great for pruning some of my indoor plants. Excited I got 3 pairs of the small ones.
customer_reviews.author: Brena

customer_reviews.title: Below average
customer_reviews.text: These are not high-quality durable pieces. What's suppose to be the sharp pieces are not sharp, the wood is soft and light weight and the metal is too thin. I think they're okay for a beginner, but these are definitely not meant to last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Great Collection, Quality Build, and Cute Design.
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for someone, and they work great. On top of that they also follow the bonsai aesthetic well, being miniature gardening equipment. The set I bought is now on display with the bonsai they prune. You can't ask for more of a bonsai gardening set.
customer_reviews.author: MadMaximillion

customer_reviews.title: Not As Described/Item Was Used/Scratched up and dirty
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item for the price, however, when I received it, it was obviously used, it was scratched up and dirty. I specifically ordered a brand new one. I have returned it and will repurchase it because it's a great item for the price, so please make sure it's a brand new one. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: M. P.

customer_reviews.title: Bag snap was broken when arrived. Quality was not great
customer_reviews.text: I brought this and was very excited to receive it. I was not happy because as soon as I opened it the snap on the front broke off. It was loose from the material. The pouch is great but it is broken!
customer_reviews.author: K JUDKINS

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute.. I don't have a bonzaii, I use this for my indoor plants. The small cutter is perfect for cutting plant stems and the small rakes are also great for indoor plant use.
customer_reviews.author: Swimmy

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: As a woodworker I was ready to turn new handles but found these smooth and well fitted to the nicely formed metal rake/spade/shovel ends. The pruning scissors are sharp and well tensioned. Folding scissors and the tweezers are a good fit with the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Philsquatch

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: My fiance is starting to create a garden at home...well on our tiny enclosed patio of our condo. And these tools are perfect for everything he is doing!
customer_reviews.author: Pita

customer_reviews.title: A complete set that meets my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I am still learning how to use all of these tools, but so far so good. I have reported one ficus and it is growing like mad so if I didn't kill it, I am pleased. The case and the sheaths for the clippers (torn) are not the greatest quality but the case does the job.
customer_reviews.author: WhatTheJules

customer_reviews.title: Great little mini set !!
customer_reviews.text: Just received these for my new "hobby" and I love it. My fingers are too big to pick around these plants and using these is such a wonder and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bob

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Great and very sharp tools for all bronzai needs, , they came in a nice pouch which was a good aurprise as it is not mention in the description
customer_reviews.author: valerie mendelson

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect for my bonsai tree
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my bonsai tree. They came with a nice leather case, and the shearers are very sharp too.
customer_reviews.author: eslaugs

customer_reviews.title: Oh thy bonsai
customer_reviews.text: This is such a set. To bad I killed my bonsai and couldn’t ever use it. But hey. If you keep it alive long enough then go for it it’ll help keep it nice and trimmed
customer_reviews.author: Ckirmo

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little beginner set definitely recommend buying This item if you are a beginner or even a pro It’s very well made for the price
customer_reviews.author: Coll

customer_reviews.title: ... a lovely little leather pouch so that was a nice
customer_reviews.text: I'm not well versed in bonsai tree maintenance but the set is cute and comes in a lovely little leather pouch so that was a nice touch
customer_reviews.author: bikesingread

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for begineers...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool variety for beginners and a decent quality. Very good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RHF111

customer_reviews.title: Nice beginner set
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband as he is a beginner bonsai tree person. He has used this tool set already and states that they are durable. When he perfects bonsai care, he will probably get another set that has the soil reader. But no complaints from him!
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopping Guru

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for the money. I've been doing bonsai and growing potted plants for 20+ years. I would with out a doubt recommend this kit for personal use or a good gift. The triple set of pruning shears alone is worth the order. The other stuff is just 'gravy.'
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, pointless.
customer_reviews.text: Pointless. There’s no need for a tiny person shovel or half this crap. It’s all very low quality. Silly, if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not so sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I used the rake on my bonsai the rake head fell off the handle. I'm not sure it was ever securely attached because my use was so gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Dulcie Anne

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice kit for the price, I just wish the tools were a little more heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Really great starter set
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the Bonsai beginner. I use the various tools all the time.
customer_reviews.author: B. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Some of the tools like the clippers are good. But all the tools with the wood is crap. They break really easy. It’s made of pine wood and some of them have rot in it. The bigger spade broke without me putting any effort into it.
customer_reviews.author: Vidyashankara Iyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a starter bonsai
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who has a lot of time on her hands. She loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Roslyn Winters

customer_reviews.title: Too Big,Flimsy Looking,Showed up Scratched.
customer_reviews.text: These are much bigger than I expected. They are also made our of cheap materials and seem flimsy. I will probably just spend more on quality tools. These we're so cheap,they weren't worth the $4 return fee,so I'll keep them I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: IT ARRIVED ON TIME BUT TURNED OUT TO BE A ...

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set.

customer_reviews.title: Great tools for success

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set, high quality tools.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool Set for the price

product_meta.title: ZELAR MADE Bonsai Set 8 Pcs - Include Pruner,Fold Scissors,Mini Rake,Bud & Leaf Trimmer Set
feature_bullets: Set of 8 - Include 3 Bonsai Pruning scissors + 1Folding Scissor + 1 Wooden rake + 2 Wooden spades + 1 Stainless Steel tweezer.
Super handy,you'll want to keep these in several places so that they're always at hand for a quick snip.
Wash after every use,pat dry,and lightly oil.
These traditing looking bonsai tools are very high quality,and an amazing price.
100% Customer Satisfaction and Quality Guarantee! Free Replacement if any shipping broken.
